LanguageData.Hediffs_MiningLv1.description: Tip 1: Level 2 of Saikutsu (Mining) Knowhow has a short term buff tied to it.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MiningLv2.label: Saikutsu Knowhow Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MiningLv2.description: Tip 2: Level 3 & 4 of this buff grant permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Mining.label: Saikutsu Knowhow
LanguageData.Hediffs_Mining.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
